**[Andrés Cruz](https://arcruz0.github.io/), Senior Research Analyst**
<br>Andrés Cruz is a PhD student at the Department of Government and an MS student in the Department of Statistics and Data Sciences at the University of Texas at Austin. He studies political methodology with applications in comparative politics. His research interests include data quality, measurement error, and computational social science. He received a BA and MA in Political Science from Pontificia Universidad Católica de Chile.
